member.name: T:TextCopy.Clipboard
member.summary: Provides methods to place text on and retrieve text from the system Clipboard.

member.name: M:TextCopy.Clipboard.GetTextAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves text data from the Clipboard.

member.name: M:TextCopy.Clipboard.GetText
member.summary: Retrieves text data from the Clipboard.

member.name: M:TextCopy.Clipboard.SetTextAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Clears the Clipboard and then adds text data to it.

member.name: M:TextCopy.Clipboard.SetText(System.String)
member.summary: Clears the Clipboard and then adds text data to it.
